s: July 27, 2023 - Amazon has announced the titles that will be coming to their cloud gaming service, Amazon Luna, for the month of August 2023.

Amazon Luna is a cloud gaming and streaming service where players can enjoy a number of curated games on their mobile device, computer, etc. The service offers multiple channels to subscribe to for a monthly fee. A separate Amazon Luna controller can also be purchased and used.
